roleset.name: not watched over, chaperoned
roleset.note: UNSUPERVISED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, relation to 'supervise.01'. (from unsupervised.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Now , the newest nuclear reactor in the world can remain safe even if it has been unsupervised for 36 hours after an emergency stop .
